name: PEM_XS_BAT_PERF_STAT_ALL_CPU_EVENT_PL1_MMIO
summary: Verify all CPUs in system-wide which core base_frequency excursion occurred due to  RAPL (Running Average Power Limit) power limit 1 set via RAPL MMIO interface (E.g. (E.g. powercap/intel-rapl-mmio*/constraint_0_power_limit_uw) in duration by command: perf sta    t -a -e pnp_excursion_monitor/$e_name,frequency_threshold=$base_freq_mhz,duration=10/ sleep 60
